categories: Category:Creatures of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The quohr were carnivores which roamed the glaciers and tundra of the planet Entooine in packs of eight to twelve. They stood between 1 and 1.5 meters at their shoulders, and had fur which ranged from snow-white to gray-streaked. They were known to attack their prey by pouncing on them and then biting. When they were starving, they were known to fight to the death to get a meal. The native Askhew were known to have tamed some quohr and used them to draw their sleds. Generally, a team of four to eight quohr would pull a single sled which was loaded down with a maximum of 200 kilograms.
